category.name: Interface.Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ImpactAnalysisViewWhereUsedBatchSize
preference.preference_description: Defines the number of WhereUsed nodes which will be sent to the server SOA in a single request. These nodes are displayed in the Where Used pane of the Impact Analysis View. A valid value is a strictly positive integer. The default value is set to 5000. Increasing the value might negatively affect the UI rendering performance of the Impact Analysis View for Teamcenter Rich Client. Reducing the value increases the client/server chattiness, which might also negatively affect the performance.
